jld.title: Connect Your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile With Social Media Networks, Other Lawyer Directories, and Legal Publishing Profiles, Now Including USAttorneys.com
description: On your Justia Lawyer Directory profile, you can link to and feature your social media accounts, including LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and X (formerly known as Twitter). In addition, you can link to and feature other lawyer directories and legal publishing profiles, including Avvo, Lawyers.com, Martindale, JD Supra, BePress, SSRN, and the recently added USAttorneys.com (if you donâ€™t yet have a USAttorneys profile, you may create one here). These other social and legal website profiles can help raise your reputation in the legal community and provide you with additional places to share your legal knowledge.
